name: Hymnal's Memoria
text: If your J/ruler isn't "Songtress of Shangri-La" or "Coup d'Etat Mastermind, Shion", this card enters your magic stone area rested. : Produce . When this card enters your magic stone area, name a card. Reveal the top card of your main deck, if it's the named card, put it into your hand.
